text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Well then, Ticket will be the pilot, and for the other seat… I would say Taishin, as she can fix any mechanical issues.

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Eeeeeeh! Turbo wants to fly too! Let me go! Let me go!! IIII waannaaaaa gooooooo!!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: There are only two seats on this plane, right?

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: I think it should be fine with three, really? Especially 'cause Turbo and Taishin are tiny!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Hey wha…! Look who's talking!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: … Hmm, my calculations tell me that is indeed fine. Well, Taishin's skills can probably take care of trouble anyway.

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: So Turbo can ride too, yeah!? Woohoo!!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Haah…… seriously.

text_block_list.name: Airplane Researcher
text_block_list.text: We've built this plane together… this time, surely…! Please, let it bear fruit…!!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Whoa……!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Whoooooo! It's flying!! Loooook idsh really vlyiiiinhg uoooooh!

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: We're flying! Flyiiiing! Awesoooome! Look, Taishin, look! They look so tiny!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Double Loud…! It's small enough here without your noise!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Yeaah! We're going to go straight over the mountains!! Goooooo!!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: They are definitely gaining altitude. It does look like the mountains won't pose a problem.

text_block_list.name: Airplane Researcher
text_block_list.text: Amazing…… we might really… actually do it…!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Of course we are, Wunderkind Teio is here after all! Now, what will they find beyond the mountains～♪ I can't wait to hear!

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Mountains, mountains, mountains! ……Oh!! Look, look, over there!! There's something there! A city!? Is that a city!?

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: What did you see now… Oh, there is. Huh!? Is that a robot!? That huge!?

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Ahahahaha! Amaazing! Let's go land……… agh!! ―Oh no, we're almost halfway through our fuel!

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Eeeeeeeeeeeehh!? I wanna go to that robo-city!! We can get there, Ticket! Mind over body!!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Right on! Power of the mind!!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Will you two quit that!?

text_block_list.name: Airplane Researcher
text_block_list.text: ―A city with a giant robot?! No way!? Did it move, that robot?!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: I don't know. If only we could have landed there to ask about it. Aah, I wish I could seen it from closer by～!

text_block_list.name: Airplane Researcher
text_block_list.text: Then our next goal will be increasing our fuel efficiency to extend our flight range so we can land in the robot city! So―

text_block_list.name: Girl
text_block_list.text: Hahh, haah…… Ahh, there she is! Hey Miss!! Hey, that airplane is yours, right!?

text_block_list.name: Boy
text_block_list.text: That airplane went over the mountain, right!? What did you see on the other side? Tell me, tell me!

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Whoa, a bunch of kids! I see adults gathering too!?

text_block_list.name: Client Of Delivery Requests
text_block_list.text: Was that your plane flying over the mountains!? My word, that took me by surprise! And you all came back in one piece!

text_block_list.name: Eatery Employee
text_block_list.text: I can't believe a lump of iron really flew.…… I guess I owe you an apology, huh? Sorry for calling it a fantasy.

text_block_list.name: Workshop Seamstress
text_block_list.text: You mentioned a town with giant robots earlier! I wish I could go there too! Planes really are great!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Look at all these people from the city……! Ah……!

text_block_list.name: Airplane Researcher
text_block_list.text: !! Master……!

text_block_list.name: Previous Researcher
text_block_list.text: I watched your test flight…… from here. Congratulations.

text_block_list.name: Airplane Researcher
text_block_list.text: Thanks……! It's because of you. Because of all your research… that brought us together, and we were able to complete it!!

text_block_list.name: Metal Researcher
text_block_list.text: You must be this "Master" then! I've been dying to speak with you! I've developed an all new alloy from seeing the engine in that aircraft !

text_block_list.name: Previous Researcher
text_block_list.text: That plane's… really… I see…! … So my dream… The years of research… They weren't for nothing……!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Heheh, we did a good job, didn't we?

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Oooooouuoooh! Dhe emozions… THE I MO ZYOONS～～! Gongradulazionzszz—! I'm zo ghlaaaaouaoaghd～～～～!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Haha, you're crying even harder than usual. ―…… Oh, but it's about time to go home.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: …… Just how long are you going to cry for.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: 'Caauuse… I remembered. How in the Derby I dreamt of, everyone was shining so bright too. The winners, the losers, everyone!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: I wanted to shine and sparkle like that too! Like that researcher and her mentor! Linking everyone's dreams together, carrying them on!!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: When I thought about that… I just get so overwhelmed by emotions! Wuuuooooooo～!!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Haah…… I can't believe you even manage to busy yourself with strangers' dreams. Room to spare, do you, Ticket?

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: — But she's not alone in wanting to carry on such dreams. I, too, want to reach out to someone with my running.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: And together with you two.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: …… That so?

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Heheh, just like me then! And that's exactly what prez's done, of course!

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Turbo… doesn't really know! Run, full power, always! That's it!!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Ahaha! Your full power is a whole bundle of dreams! Master Twin Turbo♪
